body:
Hi all,



does anyone knows why Dragonfly doesn't complete the installation in a proper way? I simply run the .gh from the sampleFiles folder downloaded from GitHub.



It gives this error:

1. Solution exception:Could not add reference to assembly DynamoCore



Honeybee, Matlab compiler 9.0 and UWGv4.1 are installed properly.



Thank you,

Federico

replies.body:
Federico,

You are looking in the wrong folder on the github.  The platform-agnostic version of the Dragonfly core is not finished yet.  You want to just install the userobjects from here and then you will be all set:

[https://github.com/chriswmackey/Dragonfly/tree/master/userObjects](https://github.com/chriswmackey/Dragonfly/tree/master/userObjects)

-Chris

Hi Chris,



thank you, now it's working.
